title: New Client Keeps Crashing
body:
Okay, I am not one to complain, but riot. As soon as Season 7 started my client has started crashing after every other game. I get to play one then the next as soon as champ select is over, it crashes. And will not let me open up LoL even after i open task manager and close the client. I have to restart my PC every time just to be allowed to open the client back up. It just crashed on me about 10 minutes ago and gave me a loss for my placements, and gave me a warning for leaver buster, and I have never left a game. Can you please take that loss away and fix this issues. My account is Lee Cheese Sin. 

Please and Thank You,
I Land Qs

replies.body: Aww thats too bad... and yeah its an error message. and once i click it, it doesnt let me reconnect back into the game.

I can't remove stats or losses, but I'd like to help figure out what's causing your issue to help prevent any penalties by [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).  What do you mean specifically by crash?  Are you seeing error messages or something else?  Anymore specifics can help a lot!
